hotels.title: Sarawak Waterfront Pullman Miri Escape near Gunung Mulu National Park with Infinity Pool & Three Restaurants
hotels.description: This stylish Pullman coastal sanctuary is greeted by picturesque South China Sea views and acts as an ideal gateway to the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Gunung Mulu National Park. Take a dip in the sparkling infinity-edge saltwater pool, work up a sweat in the well-equipped fitness centre or simply, relax and unwind in your plush room, adorned with grey and blue furnishings. Savour Malaysian and international delicacies at the modern Pullman Kitchen, vibe to live jazz performances with a drink at The Chamber and catch epic sunsets from the seventh-floor Splash Pool Bar and pair it with refreshing cocktails. When you're ready to explore, find yourself within an easy drive from the lively Miri Handicraft Centre, the historic Tua Pek Kong temple and shop till you drop at Bintang Megamall.
